scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n server,web -c blue,green "bun run --filter @agent-canvas/server dev" "bun run --filter web dev"
scripts.build: bun run --filter @agent-canvas/shared build && bun run --filter @agent-canvas/server build && bun run --filter web build && bun run --filter agent-canvas build
scripts.build:link: bun run build && bun run bundle:web && cd apps/cli && bun link
scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/shared/dist packages/server/dist apps/web/dist apps/cli/dist apps/cli/web node_modules bun.lock
